alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:37PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 415 PM MST... At 337 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Horseshoe Reservoir, or 12 miles west of Sycamore Creek. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Horseshoe Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River
